[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/server"}]," API 允许你在服务器上将 React 组件渲染为 HTML。这些 API 仅在服务器应用程序顶层调用，以生成初始 HTML。有的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/start-a-new-react-project#production-grade-react-frameworks","children":"框架"}]," 可能会为你调用相关 API，大多数组件不需要导入或使用这些 API。"]}]}],"
